broadwick.montecarlo

Class MonteCarloScenario

  • java.lang.Object
    • broadwick.montecarlo.MonteCarloScenario
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public abstract class MonteCarloScenario
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A simple model class thats runs a model and creates named quantities, i.e. a map containing the vlaues and their names.
    See Also:
